description:
Me: Sons of Djorks, I am Magical Unicorn - Mvc Request Header Authorization Attribute.

You: You're 7 GitHub projects, tall ...

Me: Yes, I've heard. Kills Meme's by the hundreads and if he were here he'd consume Rails with fireballs from his eyes and bolts of lightning from his arse. I AM MGMRHAA. And I see a whole army of my programmers here in defiance of missing-framework titty sprinkle authorization functionality.

Someone else: Program? Against that? No, we Cancel; and we live.

Me: Aye, program and you may die. Cancel and you'll live -- at least a while. And dying in your beds many years from now .. would you be willing to trade all the days from this day, to that, for one chance .. .just one change to back here and tell our enemy-languages that they make take our code, but they'll never take our freedom!!!

All: Freedome forever!
summary: A simple attribute that handles custom Http Header Authorization. Eg. Basic Authentication, OAuth or a custom Api.
title: Magical Unicorn Mvc Request Header Authorize Attribute
